title: The Reverend

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose 2 players to Pray for.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player you Pray for is attacked, their death is delayed by a night. Delayed death may not be prevented for any reason.
- When you Pray for a player, they are cleansed of all evil effects (ex: frames, douses, poison).
- If they are attacked, the attacker is informed the defense was too strong to kill.
- Players you Pray for will not be notified that their death was delayed.
- You are informed if you delay a player's death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5343
*He speaks thy holy name. In thy breath no more shall sin remain.*
